channel.title: TCP VPN DNS leaks
channel.description: I got an eg.ovpn over tcp from https://www.freeopenvpn.org/en/ on Whonix-Ubuntu-Workstation and run it with command openvpn eg.ovpn. Checking my IP address online shows my ip address is now changed to the VPN service provider but I am leaking DNS which shows TOR service provider's DNS address. Is there a way to prevent the DNS leaks?

item.title: TCP VPN DNS leaks

item.description:
